name: Modern Standard Chinese II
description: This course is a continuation of EAS100Y1. Students learn major grammatical structures which are not introduced in the first year and expand their vocabulary. Students who do not meet the prerequisite must go through a placement process conducted by the Department. See eas.utoronto.ca/languages/chinese for details.
prerequisites: EAS100Y1 (minimum grade 67%)/equivalent as determined by placement process.
exclusions: EAS101Y1, EAS201H1, LGGB60H3, LGGB61H3, CHI200Y5, CHI201Y5
